param.name: zipPath
param.label: Build directory
param.description:
The folder where your final package ends up. The folders extension_name and version will be added automatically.
If left blank the default folder will be used.

param.name: files
param.label: Log file contents
param.description: Log the contents / the code of the files been written to disk

param.name: versionCheck
param.label: Check EasyCreator version
param.description: Automatically check for the latest EasyCreator version.

param.name: ecr_help
param.label: Help Type
param.description: Choose the type of help you need (from beginner to expert). Messages will be displayed all over the place in light green boxes - you may also switch them off here.

param.name: editarea_type
param.label: Editor type
param.description: Which EditArea type shall we load (please see docu on developers site http://www.cdolivet.net/editarea/editarea/docs/include.html)

param.name: editarea_font_size
param.label: Editor font size
param.description: The default font size for the code editor in pixel

param.name: local_api_copy
param.label: Local API copy
param.description: Your copy of the Joomla! API - get it from http://api.joomla.org

param.name: warn_livesite
param.label: Livesite warning
param.description: If a IP other then 127.0.0.1 is detected a warning message will be displayed for your own safety

param.name: save_versions
param.label: Save versions
param.description: When modifying your files, always save a backup version. These will be named *.rx

param.name: use_google_trans_api
param.label: Use Google translation API
param.description: Should we use the Google Translation API for helping in translations ?

param.name: langfiles_chk_utf8
param.label: Check for UTF8
param.description: Should languages files be checked for UTF-8

param.name: langfiles_chk_bom
param.label: Check for BOM
param.description: Should languages files be checked for a BOM

param.name: ecr_debug
param.label: Debugger
param.description: Shall we use the Debug mode ?

param.name: ecr_debug_lang
param.label: Debug language
param.description: Shall we debug our special language files ?
